resources.string: The key used to encrypt the Guest-WiFi network traffic
Use a different, random encryption key each time a Guest-WiFi is started
Only allow surfing and mailing in the Guest-WiFi
Devices in the Guest-WiFi network can communicate with each other
Password too short - appending random number
Scan this code from an Android device to connect to the Guest-WiFi

The Fritz!Box login requires authentication. Please enter the account information for a Fritz!Box user with permission to change the Fritz!Box settings. You can leave the username empty if you have not setup any account on your Fritz!Box
The Fritz!Box login is blocked for another %d seconds due to too many failed login attempts
Not connected to Fritz!Box.\nPlease connect to your Fritz!Box WiFi network to be able to read and change the state of the guest network
App runs in trial mode - WiFi Name (SSID) and password can not be changed. Click here to purchase the full version of the app
Can not connect to license server, please try again later
Delete any saved Fritz!Box login data
Fritz!Box not found. Please make sure that you\'re connected to the private Fritz!Box WiFi network with this device
Login page not found - your Fritz!Box software version might not be supported
Guest-WiFi settings not found - please make sure your Fritz!Box supports this feature and contact me if it does
If the connection to the Fritz!Box does not work, try entering the IP address directly
